headline.main: SCIENTISTS SEE NEW FREE WORLD; London-New York Broadcast Devoted to Discussion of Post-War Problems

lead_paragraph: A world free of war and tyranny, with scientists taking a more active part in political economy to prevent wars and to enable the mass of people to satisfy their physical wants, was pictured yesterday by scientists and science editors who discussed the present and future over the radio from London and New York.
abstract: S on science and post-war world, BAAS
